# Test that basic defs work

preguide -out _output
! stdout .+
! stderr .+
cmp _output/_posts/defs.md defs/en.out.golden

-- defs/en.md --
---
title: A test with defs
---
# Hello <!--ref: world -->
-- defs/guide.cue --
package guide

import "github.com/play-with-go/preguide"

preguide.#Guide

Image: "this_will_never_be_used"
Defs: world: "world"
-- defs/en.out.golden --
---
image: golang@sha256:b451547e2056c6369bbbaf5a306da1327cc12c074f55c311f6afe3bfc1c286b6
lang: en
title: A test with defs
---
# Hello world
